document_data.title: Honor Among Thieves: The Quest Begins
document_data.author: [[Matt Huntley]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Honor Among Thieves: The Quest Begins''''' by [[Matt Huntley]] and illustrated by [[Alan Batson]] and [[Grace Mills]] is a novella based on the ''[[Honor Among Thieves]]'' movie set to be released on February 28, 2023. It is intended for children aged 3–7.
{{quote|
'''This storybook is based on the film ''Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves'' ­– in theaters March 3, 2023!'''

''Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves'' is an upcoming high-fantasy heist film based on the popular role-playing game! Co-written and co-directed by [[Jonathan Goldstein]] and [[John Francis Daley]] (''Spider-Man: Homecoming'', ''Game Night''), and produced by [[Jeremy Latcham]] (''Spider-Man: Homecoming'', ''Guardians of the Galaxy''), the film stars [[Chris Pine]], [[Michelle Rodriguez]], [[Hugh Grant]], [[Regé-Jean Page]], [[Justice Smith]], and [[Sophia Lillis]]. Kids ages 3 to 7 will love this storybook based on the film!|Publisher's description}}
